infotexts.jobdescription.laborer: Work at the factory to refine raw materials into equipment, weapons, tools, ammo and armor. From time to time have a drink with the lads and plan an uprising agaisn't your oppressors. We work to earn the right to work to earn the right to give ourselves the right to buy ourselves the right to live to earn the right to die.
infotexts.jobdescription.clown: The only rule is there are no rules! Expect to be arrested or even killed on sight by just about anyone.
infotexts.jobdescription.foreman: A specialization of the Security Officer. Take care of the security and structure of both the dam and its reactor.
infotexts.jobdescription.researcher: A specialization of the Medical Doctor. Aside from providing healthcare, you will also conduct often unethical research. Try and produce antidotes to infections by using your blood sampler on infected and later refining your live samples into antidotes in a medical fabricator.
infotexts.jobdescription.diver: A specialization of the Security Officer. Mine for minerals in the dam and kill local wildlife low as they appear. If there isn't anything to mine or nothing to hunt, you can also just work as an additional security officer.
infotexts.jobdescription.jet: Jovian Elite Troops. Destroy that dam and kill every single bastard inside who isn't allied with the separatists.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.immuneboost: The immunse-system has been boosted and will react faster.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.immuneresponse: The body is working hard at fighting an infection.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.fever: Fights infections, but too high body temperatures can be counterproductive and even lethal. Treatable with Stabilozine.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bacterialgangrene: Superficial gangrene caused by bacteria, may cause bacterial infection if not treated. Apply antibiotics or wash with ethanol.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.fluinfection: Vry contagious pulmonary infection. Usually not lethal on its own. Causes vulnerability to opportunistic bacterial infections and shortness of air.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bacterialinfection: A broad unspecific bacterial infection. Usually not lethal on its own. Treatable with Broad-spectrum Antibiotics
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tbinfection: A very lethal bacterial lung infection, also highly transmissible. If untreated, will very likely result in death. Treatable with Broad-spectrum Antibiotics
infotexts.entitydescription.money: Nexcredits (TM) can be exchanged for goods at Nexshops (TM). This message was sponsored by Nexpharma (TM).
infotexts.entitydescription.fakemoney: Any human can easily tell these are fake, but they can still spoof Nexshops. Very much illegal!
infotexts.entitydescription.moneycase: Money? I love money! Do you love money?
infotexts.entitydescription.flusyringe: A syringe containing a live sample of influenza that was taken from someone using a blood sampler. Can be made into Influenza Antidote in a medical fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.fluantidote: A concoction of a weakened flu virus and antibodies. Quickly heals any ongoing flu infection and gives temporary immunity to it aswell.
infotexts.entitydescription.bacterialsyringe: A syringe containing a live sample of bacteria that was taken from someone using a blood sampler. Can be made into Broad-spectrum Antibiotics in a medical fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.tbsyringe: A syringe containing a live sample of tuberculosis that was taken from someone using a blood sampler. Can be made into Broad-spectrum Antibiotics in a medical fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodsampler: Can be used on infected people to extract a live sample of their infection. Live disease samples can be turned into their antidotes in a medical fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.boombox5: "Tintin on the Moon" by Jeroen Tel.
infotexts.entitydescription.jetmask: A diving mask and a helmet! How convenient.
infotexts.entitydescription.divinghelmet: A diving mask and a helmet! How convenient.
infotexts.entitydescription.hardhat: Crucial to maintain a safe working environment. Keeps your head safe!
infotexts.entitydescription.disposabledivingmask: Disposable emergency oxygen mask. Also serves a medical purpose since it lowers oxygen low, helping keep patients with a critical status alive.
infotexts.entitydescription.toolboxgun: A portable guntainer for storing tools and supplies.
infotexts.entitydescription.antiquerevolver: An old single-action handcannon. Despite the age, still packs a punch.
infotexts.entitydescription.foldableshotgun: An antique shotgun that manages to have both power and portability by being foldable.
infotexts.entitydescription.separatistrifle: Classic soviet 7.62x39mm design used by freedom fighters, terrorists or both depending on who you ask.
infotexts.entitydescription.762magazine: A magazine containing 30 rounds of soviet 7.62x39mm.
infotexts.entitydescription.pistol: A finely-crafted compact 9mm pistol designed for civilian use.
